snippet: Legal experts said Alabama’s clash of federal and state authority on the issue would almost surely end with state officials honoring the decision by a Federal District Court judge allowing the unions.
abstract: Supreme Court decision to deny Alabama's request to stay federal ruling declaring state's ban on same-sex marriage unconstitutional deals blow to reasoning behind Alabama Chief Justice Roy S Moore's order for state judges to not grant licenses for such marriages.
lead_paragraph: Legal experts said Alabama’s clash of federal and state authority on the issue would almost surely end with state officials honoring the decision by a Federal District Court judge allowing the unions.

headline.main: Supreme Court Undercuts Alabama Chief Justice’s Argument to Delay Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Undercuts Alabama Chief Justice’s Argument to Delay Unions

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
